mapper.insert: INSERT INTO analysis(analysis_id, order_infoid, result, collection_date, analysis_date) VALUES (#{analysis_id}, #{order_infoid}, #{result}, #{collection_date}, #{analysis_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE analysis SET result = #{result}, collection_date = #{collection_date}, analysis_date = #{analysis_date} WHERE analysis_id = #{analysis_id}
mapper.select: SELECT analysis_id, order_infoid, result, collection_date, analysis_date FROM analysis WHERE order_infoid = #{order_infoid}
